actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide minimum mandatory penalties for certain public-corruption-related offenses.
short_title: Restoring Trust in Public Service Act of 2005

summary.text: Restoring Trust in Public Service Act of 2005 - Amends the federal criminal code to prescribe mandatory minimum penalties, based on the amount of unjust enrichment, to be imposed on a public official convicted of an offense arising out of conduct in the course of his or her official duty that results in that official's unjust enrichment.

titles.title: Restoring Trust in Public Service Act of 2005
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide minimum mandatory penalties for certain public-corruption-related offenses.
